title: ISic002952. I.Sicily inscription 002952
body:
1Δέκομε Λαί-
2λει Μέγα
3χαῖρε

1ΔΕΚΟΜΕΛΑΙ
2ΛΕΙΜΕΓΑ
3ΧΑΙΡΕ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

English translation

Jonathan Prag

Dekomos Lailios Mega, farewell!

commentary

The text offers a Greek transliteration of the Latin names Decimus Laelius, and either a translation of Magnus, or simply transcription of the Greek 'Mega'. Manganaro suggested this might be a libertus of Decimus Laelius, the friend of Pompeius Magnus, ftribune of 54 BC.

bibliography

  • 58.1045 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 36.0847 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796

  • Tullio 1974 131 n. 68 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002336
  • Tullio 1979 16 tav. 1.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002685
  • Tullio 1987 210 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001552
  • Tullio 1991 92 fig. 105 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001550
  • Tullio 1993 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001548
  • Tullio 1994 65-67 fig. 52 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002387
  • Brugnone 2005 849 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002116
  • Montalbano 2008 176 VS 3 tav. 33.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001740
